description: A short 5 KM takes you to some amazing views of Salt Spring Island and everything else around it.  It's got some moderately steep grades which make it less than "EASY" rating
directions: From the village near Centennial Park take Rainbow Road to Juniper Pl and turn left.  This becomes Spring Gold Way and takes you to the well marked trail head: 48°51'10.6"N 123°32'27.5"W
title: Mount Erskine (Salt Spring Island)
